City Manager
============

As appointed by the mayor and city commission of Cactus, the city manager serves as the city's chief executive officer.

Responsibilities
----------------

The chief executive officer of the City of Cactus collaborates with the city commission, Cactus department directors and city staff to establish and implement policies that create the best environment for Cactus citizens.

* Some responsibilities carried out by the city manager include:
* Long-range development of the city
* Preparation of the annual budget
* Development and implementation of personnel regulations
* Financial and administrative policies
* Appointment, management, and removal of heads of departments, subordinate officers and employees of the city as needed
* Implementation of policies and ordinances of the city council.
* Serves as public-facing representation of the city for internal and external organizations, citizens, the community and the public
* Ensures that the citizens of Cactus are provided with an appropriate level of safety, municipal services, and a clean community environment.

City Manager Biography
----------------------

City Manager Aldo Gallegos was appointed to his role in August 2011 by the city commission of Cactus. Prior to his appointment, Gallegos served as director of lab services for the Institute of Environmental Health, Texas division from 2007 to 2011. A graduate of UTEP, Aldo also held the position of microbiology supervisor for the El Paso County Department of Health.

### Education

Aldo Gallegos is a graduate of Cactus Elementary, Dumas Junior High and Dumas Senior High Schools. After graduating high school in 2001, Aldo attended the University of Texas at El Paso, earning a bachelor's degree in microbiology and biochemistry in 2005. He obtained a master's degree in business administration from Texas Tech in 2016.

### Professional Affiliations, Boards & Memberships

* Texas City Management Association
* Panhandle City Managers Association
* Past serving president

### Personal Life

Aldo has been married to his wonderful and supportive wife, Sonia Gallegos since 2014. Sonia has been an accomplished and recognized hairstylist for over 15 years. They are proud parents of Sarahi, Ebani and Aldo Jr. Aldo enjoys spending time with his family, traveling, working on his Jeeps and hanging out with friends.
